Class WorkoutServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.fitnessforge.service.WorkoutServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
WorkoutService
@Service public class WorkoutServiceImpl extends Object implements WorkoutService
Description:

Concrete Implementation class for interface MemberService

  • Method Details

    • updateMemberWorkouts

      protected void updateMemberWorkouts(Workout workout, Long memberId, boolean remove)
      Updates the workouts column of the member by adding the newly created workout id to the workouts column
      Parameters:
      workout - an object of entity Workout
      memberId - the id of the entity Member
      remove - an helper variable to notify whehter delete operation to be performed or not

      Parameters:
      workout - an object of Workout entity
      memberId - the id of entity Member
      Returns:
      an object of Workout entity

    • checkCurrentDay

      protected boolean checkCurrentDay(List<String> days)
      The method checks if the current day is present in the provided list of days.
      Parameters:
      days - List of names of days of the week
      Returns:
      boolean value of whether the day exists or not.

    • getExerciseDuration

      protected int getExerciseDuration(Workout workout)
      Calculates and provided the total duration of a single exercise in seconds based on the total duration of the workout.
      Parameters:
      workout - an object of entity Workout
      Returns:
      the total duration of a single exercise (in seconds).

    • getTotalDuration

      protected int getTotalDuration(int[] duration, int restDuration)
      Calculate average time required for an exercise to complete based on its duration of reps and rest duration
      Parameters:
      duration - rep duration of the exericse
      restDuration - duration of rest between sets
      Returns:
      average duration of the exercise based on its duration and rest duration.

    • getTotalDuration

      protected int getTotalDuration(int[] sets, int[] reps, int restDuration)
      Calculate average time required for an exercise to complete based on its duration of sets, reps and rest duration
      Parameters:
      sets - set range of the exercise
      reps - rep range of the exercise
      restDuration - duration of rest between sets
      Returns:
      average duration of the exercise based on its sets, reps and rest duration.

    • getExercisesMap

      protected Map<String,Integer> getExercisesMap(Workout workout)
      Calculates and returns a map of string and integer, where the string is the category name and the integer is the number of exercises that need to be included based on duration.
      Parameters:
      workout - an object of entity Workout
      Returns:
      an map of string and integer i.e Map(String, Integer)

    • getWorkoutExercises

      public List<Map<String,Object>> getWorkoutExercises(Workout workout)
      Compiles a full list of different variations of workouts, based on the workout templete with their specifications defined in it.
      Specified by:
      getWorkoutExercises in interface WorkoutService
      Parameters:
      workout - an object of entity Workout
      Returns:
      an list of map of category and list of Exercise ( List(Map(String, List(Object))) )

    • updateWorkout

      public Workout updateWorkout(Workout newWorkout)

      Parameters:
